page.title: 12ENTERTAINMENT AT AN INN
page.content: Eighteen months ago the landlady at the Old Duke William introduced a light meal service of quick grills, sandwiches chips and salads. This is most popular at lunch time although it is available in the evenings. On Monday evenings there is a special games night for the darts and dominoes specialists. Country and Western style music is provided on Wednesday evenings for the over 23 age group and there is a" Golden Oldie" Discoe on Saturdays which caters for all ages. Many people celebrate special occasions at the pub such as 21st birthdays and retirement parties-, sitting together as a group and buying drinks and sometimes food for their guests. The landlady feels that most people go to a pub for company and a chat.
